mapper.select: SELECT locus FROM mme WHERE locus = #{locus}

select
from mme where type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ec2 like #{ec2} + "%"

select
from mme where
pdbId = #{pdbId} AND
type = #{type} AND
ec2 = #{ec2} AND
operator = #{operator} AND
modifier = #{modifier} AND
operateDate > #{startDate_op} AND operateDate < #{endDate_op} AND
modifyDate > #{startDate_md} AND modifyDate < #{endDate_md} AND
1=1 limit #{startSize},#{endSize}

select count(*) from mme where
pdbId = #{pdbId} AND
type = #{type} AND
ec2 = #{ec2} AND
operator = #{operator} AND
modifier = #{modifier} AND
operateDate > #{startDate_op} AND operateDate < #{endDate_op} AND
modifyDate > #{startDate_md} AND modifyDate < #{endDate_md} AND
1=1
